metadata.title: CVE-2016-6334 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in theParser::replaceInternalLinks2 method in MediaWiki before 1.23.15, 1.26.xbefore 1.26.4, and 1.27.x before 1.27.1 allows remote attackers to injectarbitrary web script or HTML via vectors involving replacement of percentencoding in unclosed internal links.

criterions.comment: mediawiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
